formParams.description: The reason for the report. Default maximum of 1000 characters.

category
formParams.description: Specify if the report is due to `spam`, `violation` of enumerated instance rules, or some `other` reason. Defaults to `other`. Will be set to `violation` if `rule_ids[]` is provided (regardless of any category value you provide).

For `violation` category reports, specify the ID of the exact rules broken. Rules and their IDs are available via [GET /api/v1/instance/rules]({{< relref "methods/instance#rules" >}}) and [GET /api/v1/instance]({{< relref "methods/instance#get" >}}).

formParams.description: Request specific measures by their keystring. Supported measures include:
formParams.name: keys[]
start_at
formParams.description: The start date for the time period. If a time is provided, it will be ignored.

formParams.name: end_at
formParams.description: The end date for the time period. If a time is provided, it will be ignored.

formParams.name: tag_accounts
formParams.description: tag_accounts[id]: When `tag_accounts` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a tag ID to obtain the measure of how many accounts used that hashtag in at least one status within the given time period.

formParams.name: tag_uses
formParams.description: tag_uses[id]: When `tag_uses` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a tag ID to obtain the measure of how many statuses used that hashtag within the given time period.

formParams.name: tag_servers
formParams.description: tag_servers[id]: When `tag_servers` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a tag ID to obtain the measure of how many servers used that hashtag in at least one status within the given time period.

formParams.name: instance_accounts
formParams.description: instance_accounts[domain]: When `instance_accounts` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many accounts have been discovered from that server within the given time period.

formParams.name: instance_media_attachments
formParams.description: instance_media_attachments[domain]: When `instance_media_attachments` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how much space is used by media attachments from that server within the given time period.

formParams.name: instance_reports
formParams.description: instance_reports[domain]: When `instance_reports` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many reports have been filed against accounts from that server within the given time period.

formParams.name: instance_statuses
formParams.description: instance_statuses[domain]: When `instance_statuses` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many statuses originate from that server within the given time period.

instance_follows[domain]: When `instance_follows` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many follows were performed on accounts from that server by local accounts within the given time period.
formParams.name: instance_follows
instance_followers
formParams.description: instance_followers[domain]: When `instance_followers` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many follows were performed by accounts from that server on local accounts within the given time period.
